original_text: these self-styled athletes have banged their brains into the ground so frequently and furiously , their capacity to explain themselves has gone the same way as their natural instinct for self-preservation .
generated_text:
1. "The plot twists are so convoluted, it's a miracle anyone can still remember their own name, let alone explain the story."
2. "The acting is so over-the-top, it's a wonder the actors didn't lose their minds trying to keep up the charade."
3. "The dialogue is so cringe-worthy, it's a miracle anyone can still form a coherent sentence, let alone convey a meaningful message."
4. "The characters are so poorly written, it's a wonder anyone can still recognize their own reflection, let alone make sense of their motivations."
